verbs.description: red sox topple dodgers in game 4 boston now 1 game away from world series title [ARG1: the red sox] [V: rallied] [ARG3: from a four - run deficit] [ARGM-TMP: in the seventh inning] [ARG4: for a 9 - 6 win dodgers boston boston red sox steve pearce clayton kershaw enrique hernandez quique hernández xander bogaert sox brock holt mitch moreland chris sale max muncy los angeles dodgers rafael devers yasiel puig craig kimbrel world series]

red sox topple dodgers in game 4 boston now 1 game away from world series title the red sox rallied from a four - run deficit in the seventh inning for a 9 - 6 win dodgers boston boston red sox steve pearce clayton kershaw enrique hernandez quique hernández xander bogaert sox brock holt mitch moreland chris sale max muncy los angeles dodgers [V: rafael] devers yasiel puig craig kimbrel world series
